extension.description:
Web Viewer is a linear text web browser. It is linear because it doesn't render pages, it filters them and displays text in the order it is found in the original HTML.
Web viewer also allows addon developers to process application authorization (ie. facebook,flickr etc.) with little programming and without violating terms of use.
What it does: *You can follow links, fill out forms, view images *Stream video/audio links *It has back/forward history *Bookmarks
What it doesn't do: *Handle style sheets, javascript, flash, etc. *Make web pages look good :) *Lots of other stuff
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Text to speech for XBMC
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: ruuk's XBMC addon repository for bleeding edge and likely buggy :) versions.
Module providing encrypted password storage via keyrings. Will attempt to use the system keyring if available, or fallback to an internal file based encrypted keyring.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction
extension.description: Module providing access to youtube-dl video stream extraction for over 270 sites. Version is based on youtube-dl date version: YY.MDD.V where V is the addon specific sub-version. Also provides downloading with the option for background downloading with a queue and queue manager.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Receive, view, send and manage Pusbullet pushes.
extension.description: A Pushbullet client that receives/sends pushes and/or mirrors other devices. Send videos, images, notes, lists and addresses from your phone and PC to Kodi/XBMC. Currently allows viewing of videos, images, audio, notes, addresses (with map) and lists (checkable).
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for anything. Please review the code if you do not trust.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007. Logo is copyright of PushBullet Inc

extension.summary: Blu-ray.com reviews, releases, deals and search.
extension.description: Enjoy Blu-ray.com content on your TV. Blu-ray.com provides great reviews with 1080p screenshots, which are nice to preview on your actual TV. You can also browse the latest releases and look for the latest Blu-ray deals. Currently in an exprimental stage is access to collections for registerd users, with the ability to mark titles watched.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Provides simple google device OAuth handling and generic device OAuth via my server
extension.description:
This module provides simple OAuth handling. The module handles all user interaction.
PicasaWeb example:
helper = OAuthHelper.GoogleOAuthorizer.( addon_id='plugin.image.picasa', client_id='blahblah342980723405.apps.googleusercontent.com', client_secret='2349057829034572', auth_scope='https://picasaweb.google.com/data/' )
token = helper.getToken()
If you want to use the generic handling, contact me.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Geek & Sundry videos such as TableTop, The Guild and Space Janitors
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Provides signal/slot mechanism for inter-addon communication
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2.1, February 1999

extension.description: Browse your and your friends' photos and videos. View and add comments and likes. View image tags.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

Web viewer also allows addon developers to process application authorization (ie. facebook,flickr etc.) with little programming and without violating terms of use.
What it does: *You can follow links, fill out forms, view images *Stream video/audio links *It has back/forward history *Bookmarks

extension.description: View and manage your Evernote notebooks and notes. Create notes and save XBMC logs and screenshots to Evernote

extension.summary: Screensaver that displays an image slideshow from a plugin
extension.description: The Slideshow screensaver will show you a slide show of images using various transition effects. It can be configured to show images from image plugins installed on XBMC
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Plugin to browse PicasaWeb albums and photos/videos
Blader door uw PicasaWeb albums en afbeeldingen van u zelf of uw vrienden.
extension.description: Browse your PicasaWeb albums and tags. Browse your favorite user's albums, tags, and their favorite users. Search your photos/videos, your contact's photos/videos, and search PicasaWeb. View maps of photos with geo location data.
Blader door uw PicasaWeb albums en afbeeldingen van u zelf of uw vrienden.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Plugin to search and browse google images
extension.description:
Search, view, and save Google Images. Includes advanced search and search history.
Note: Clicking on an image result will give you a list of images from the page the image is on, ordered by probable relevance, but containing many unwanted images.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Περιήγηση σε φόρουμ μέσω του Kodi
Naviguer dans les forums avec Kodi
Navegue polos foros a través do Kodi
Navegue por fórums através do Kodi
Navegue por fóruns através do Kodi
extension.description: Browse Forums in Kodi. Supports Tapatalk (including ProBoards, Yuku) and Forumrunner enabled forums for a total of 90,000+ forums. View forums, threads, posts, subscriptions and private messages. Follow links in Web Viewer. Post replies, send private messages, delete posts, quote posts. View images in posts, follow post forum links and download post links.

Durchsuchen Forums in Kodi. Unterstützt Tapatalk aktivierte Foren (über 60000) und Forumrunner aktivierte Foren. Unterstützt auch boxee.tv. Foren, Themen, Beiträge , Abonnements und private Nachrichten anzeigen. Folgen Sie den Links im Web Viewer. Beiträge Antworten, private Nachrichten senden, Beiträge löschen, Zitate auch. Anzeigen von Bildern in Beiträgen, Forumsbeiträge Links folgen und Links downloaden.

Περιηγηθείτε σε Φόρουμ μέσω του Kodi. Υποστηρίζονται φόρουμ με ενεργό Tapatalk (πάνω από 60000) και Forumrunner, καθώς και το boxee.tv. Δείτε φόρουμ, νήματα, αναρτήσεις, συνδρομές και προσωπικά μηνύματα. Ακολουθήστε συνδέσμους στην Προβολή Ιστού. Αναρτήστε απαντήσεις, στείλτε προσωπικά μηνύματα, διαγράψτε αναρτήσεις, παραθέστε αναρτήσεις. Προβάλλετε εικόνες σε αναρτήσεις, ακολουθήστε συνδέσμους αναρτήσεων λήψεων.

Browse Forums in Kodi. Supports Tapatalk enabled forums (over 60000) and Forumrunner enabled forums. Also supports boxee.tv. View forums, threads, posts, subscriptions and private messages. Follow links in Web Viewer. Post replies, send private messages, delete posts, quote posts. View images in posts, follow post forum links and download post links.

Browse Forums in Kodi. Supports Tapatalk enabled forums (over 60000) and Forumrunner enabled forums. Also supports boxee.tv. View forums, threads, posts, subscriptions and private messages. Follow links in Web Viewer. Post replies, send private messages, delete posts, quote posts. View images in posts, follow post forum links and download post links.

Browse Forums in Kodi. Supports Tapatalk enabled forums (over 60000) and Forumrunner enabled forums. Also supports boxee.tv. View forums, threads, posts, subscriptions and private messages. Follow links in Web Viewer. Post replies, send private messages, delete posts, quote posts. View images in posts, follow post forum links and download post links.

Visita foros desde Kodi. Soporta foros válidos para Tapatalk (más de 30.000) y Forumrunner. También soporta boxee.tv. Ve foros, hilos, temas, suscripciones y mensajes privados. Abre enlaces con Web Viewer. Escribe respuestas, manda mensajes privados, borra mensajes y menciona mensajes. Ve imágenes en mensajes, sigue enlaces del foro y descarga enlaces.

Naviguer dans les forums dans Kodi. Supporte Tapatalk forums activés (plus de 60000) et Forumrunner forums activés. Supporte aussi boxee.tv. Voir les forum, fils de discussion, messages, souscriptions et messages privés. Suivre les liens dans Web Viewer. Poster des réponses, envoyer des messages privés, effacer des messages, coter des messages. Voir des images dans les messages, suivre les liens des messages de forum et les télécharger.

Parcourir les forums dans Kodi. Prend en charge les forums utilisant Taptalk (plus de 60 000) et ceux utilisant Forumrunner. Prend aussi en charge boxee.tv. Visualiser les forums, les billets, les abonnements et les messages privés. Suivre les liens dans le visualiseur Web. Publier des réponses, envoyer des messages privés, supprimer des billets, citer des billets. Visualiser les images des billets, suivre les liens des billets et télécharger les liens des billets.

Navegue polos foros a través do Kodi. É compatíbel cos foros Tapatalk (máis de 60000) e Forumrunner e tamén con boxee.tv. Vexa foros, fíos, mensaxes, subscricións e mensaxes privadas. Consulte as ligazóns a través o Visor Web. Publique respostas, envie mensaxes privadas, elimine publicacións ou mencióneas. Vexa as imaxes das publicacións, siga e descargue as ligazóns das publicacións.

עיין בפורומים ב-Kodi. תמיכה בפורומי Tapatalk (מעל ל-60000) ו-Forumrunner. תמיכה ב-boxee.tv. הצגת פורומים, שרשורים, תגובות, הרשמות והודעות פרטיות. פתח קישורים ב-Web Viewer. פרסם תגובות, שלח הודעות פרטיות, מחק תגובות. הצג תמונות בתגובות, פתח קישורים והורד קבצים מקישורים המופיעים בתגובות.

Pregledavajte forume u Kodi-u. Podržava Tapatalk omogućene forume (preko 60000) i Forumrunner omogućene forume. Isto tako podržava boxee.tv. Pregledavajte forume, teme, postove, pretplate i privatne poruke. Slijedite poveznice u Web pregledniku. Replicirajte postove, šaljite privatne poruke, brišite postove, citirajte postove. Pogledajte slike u postovima, slijedite poveznice postova foruma i preuzmite poveznice postova.

Sfoglia i Forum dall'Kodi. Supporta i forum che usano Tapatlk (circa 60000) e Forumrunner. Supporta pure boxee.tv. Vedi i forum, le discussioni, i post, le sottoscrizioni ed i messaggi privati. Segui i link nel Visualizzatore Web. Rispondi ai post, invia messaggi privati, cancella i post e quotali. Vedi le immagini, segui i link dei post e scaricali.

Naršyti forumus Kodi sistemoje. Palaiko forumus su Tapatalk (virš 60000) ir Forumrunner. Taip pat palaiko boxee.tv. Peržiūrėkite forumus, temas, žinutes, prenumeratas ir privačius pranešimus. Atidarykite nuorodas su Web Viewer. Atsakykite į žinutes, siųskite privačius pranešimus, šalinkite žinutes, cituokite žinutes. Peržiūrėkite atvaizdus žinutėse, atidarykite žinutės forumo nuorodas ir atsisiųskite iš žinutės nuorodų.

Zoek Forums in Kodi. Ondersteunt Tapatalk gemachtigde forums (over 60000) en Forumrunner gemachtigde forums. Ondersteunt ook boxee.tv. bekijk forums, threads, berichten, inschrijvingen en private berichten. volg links in Web Viewer. Post beantwoordingen, stuur privéberichten, verwijder berichten, quote berichten, bekijk afbeeldingen in berichten, volg post forum links en download post links.

Przeglądaj fora z użyciem Kodi. Posiada wsparcie dla forów opartych o Tapatalk (ponad 60000) oraz Forumrunner. Wspiera również boxee.tv. Przeglądaj fora, wątki, posty, subskrypcje i wiadomości prywatne. Umożliwia podążanie za linkami w przeglądarce internetowej a także umieszczanie odpowiedzi, wysyłanie prywatnych wiadomości, usuwanie czy cytowanie odpowiedzi. Przeglądanie obrazów w wątku, podążanie za linkami z forum i zapisywanie umieszczonych linków.

Navegue pelos fórums no Kodi. Compatível com fórums tapatalk (mais de 60000) e Forumrunner. Também suporta boxee.tv. Veja fórums, tópicos, mensagens, subscrições e mensagens privadas. Consulte endereços através do Web Viewer. Coloque respostas, envie mensagens privadas, apague mensagens, cite mensagens. Veja imagens nas mensagens, consulte ligações das mensagens do fórum e transfira ligações das mensagens.

Navegue pelos fórums no Kodi. Compatível com fórums tapatalk (mais de 60000) e Forumrunner. Também suporta boxee.tv. Veja fórums, tópicos, mensagens, subscrições e mensagens privadas. Consulte ligações através do Web Viewer. Coloque respostas, envie mensagens privadas, apague mensagens, cite mensagens. Veja imagens nas mensagens, consulte ligações das mensagens do fórum e transfira ligações das mensagens.

Bläddra bland forum i Kodi. Stödjer Tapatalk (över 60000) och ForumRunner-aktiverade forum. Även boxee.tv stöds. Förhandsgranska forum, trådar, inlägg, prenumerationer och privatmeddelanden. Följ länkar i WebViewer. Gör inlägg, skicka privata meddelanden, ta bort inlägg, citera inlägg. Se bilder i inlägg, följ länkar och ladda ner länkar.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Allows addons to share between social web entities

flickrXBMC allows you to: Browse your photostream, collections, sets, galleries, tags, places, and favorites. Browse your contacts and their content. Search you or your contacts photostream, or search flickr.

flickrXBMC ermöglicht Fotostreams, Sammlungen, Sets, Gallerien, Tags, Orte und Favoriten zu dursuchen. Durchsuche deine Freunde und deren Fotos. Durchsuche deine Fotos oder die deiner Freunde, oder durchsuche flickr allgemein.

flickrXBMC le permite: Busca en tu galería de fotos, colecciones, conjuntos, galerías, etiquetas, lugares, y favoritos. Busque sus contactos y su contenido. Buscar contactos que usted o su galería de fotos, o flickr de búsqueda.

flickrXBMC geeft u de mogelijkheid om te bladeren door uw photostreams, verzamelingen, sets, galerijen, tags, plaatsen en favorieten. Bekijk uw contacten en hun foto's. Zoek door uw eigen of van uw contacts de photostreams of door geheel Flickr.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Quickly see which of your favorite shows are on next, and browse episode lists.
extension.description: Search and save a list of your favorite shows to be automatically updated and sorted by what's on next and highlighted for what's on today and tomorrow. Shows next and previous episode details. Select a show to browse an episode list. Select an episode for a summary.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
